 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצַח‎</span> **verb** ==cause to break or burst forth, break forth with== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break, crush***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shatter***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be joyous, hilarious***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּֽצְחוּ רִנָּה‎</span> [[Isa.14.7|Isa 14:7]] ***they have broken forth with joyous shout; Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְצְחוּ רִנָּה‎</span> [[Isa.55.12|Isa 55:12]] (of mountains); ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּצְחִי רִנָּה‎</span> [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]] (of Zion); masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּצְחוּ ר‎</span> [[Isa.44.23|Isa 44:23]]; [[Isa.49.13|Isa 49:13]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יפצחו‎</span>; of mountains); absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּצְחוּ‎</span> [[Isa.52.9|Isa 52:9]]; [[Ps.98.4|Ps 98:4]] (both + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַנְּנוּ‎</span>). **Pi\`el** ***break bones in pieces: Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּצֵּ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Mic.3.3|Mic 3:3]].
